gw.api.domain.invoice

Class AnchorDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.AnchorDate

  • public class AnchorDate
extends java.lang.Object
    An AnchorDate is the invoice day of month, invoice day of week, or every-other-week anchor date for an invoice stream. It can be viewed as a day, a day of week, or a date.
